options.name: Heart of the Party
options.description: You are a pleasure to be around. Gain +1 skill with the presence and +1 skill with expression.

options.name: First Impressions
options.description: The best time to make an impression is in your first meeting. Gain +1 skill with persuasion. Additionally, the first time you meet someone, roll a bonus dice for all social checks involving them for the next hour.

options.name: Downtime Action : Seek Ally
options.description: You spend time seeking out an ally who shares a common purpose with you, with their resources and usefulness dependent upon a persuasion check. A check of 6-9 is midly successful, gaining an ally that may offer minor assistance with your goals. A check of 10 or higher is very successful and the ally is much more resourceful. In the event of a perfect check, the ally is extremely resourceful and wields significant power and influence.
